item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

RICHTER'S
Manager Contact: Jennifer H.

Specials:
$6.00 Wine by the Glass
Draft Special - $3.50
Harpoon IPA and Harpoon UFO white ale

Appetizers - Buy 1, get the second 1/2 price

Please note: Robyn will not be able to attend, and so we need someone to serve as the contact for the evening. If you are planning on attending and willing to serve as the contact, please contact Robyn & Ben.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD.
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Richter's
